properties.description: Take 3NF SQL Azure DB schema for Orders and migrate to a denormalized schema in a new CosmosDB container

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderDetailId as integer,
		OrderId as integer,
		Email as string,
		ProductId as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceOrderDetails
source(output(
		OrderId as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Country as string,
		Phone as string,
		SMSOptIn as boolean,
		SMSStatus as string,
		Email as string,
		ReceiptUrl as string,
		Total as decimal(18,2),
		PaymentTransactionId as string,
		HasBeenShipped as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceOrders
JoinIt select(mapColumn(
		OrderId = SourceOrders@OrderId,
		OrderDate,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		Address,
		City,
		State,
		PostalCode,
		Country,
		Phone,
		SMSOptIn,
		SMSStatus,
		Email = SourceOrders@Email,
		ReceiptUrl,
		Total,
		PaymentTransactionId,
		HasBeenShipped,
		OrderDetailId,
		OrderId = SourceOrderDetails@OrderId,
		Email = SourceOrderDetails@Email,
		ProductId,
		Quantity,
		UnitPrice,
		orderdetailsstruct
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ColumnScrubber
SourceOrders, MakeStruct join(SourceOrders@OrderId == SourceOrderDetails@OrderId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinIt
ColumnScrubber derive(Total = toDouble(round(Total,2))) ~> ValueScrubber
ValueScrubber aggregate(groupBy(OrderId),
	details = collect(orderdetailsstruct),
		each(match(instr(name,'Quantity')==0&&instr(name,'UnitPrice')==0&&instr(name,'OrderId')==0), $$ = first($$))) ~> CreateArrays
Typecast derive(orderdetailsstruct = @(quantity=Quantity,
		unitcost=UnitPrice,
		orderdetailid=OrderDetailId,
		productId=ProductId)) ~> MakeStruct
SourceOrderDetails derive(UnitPrice = toDouble(round(UnitPrice,2))) ~> Typecast
CreateArrays select(mapColumn(
		OrderId,
		details,
		OrderDate,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		Address,
		City,
		State,
		PostalCode,
		Country,
		Phone,
		SMSOptIn,
		SMSStatus,
		Email,
		ReceiptUrl,
		Total,
		PaymentTransactionId,
		HasBeenShipped,
		orderdetailsstruct
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns
RemoveColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/OrderId'],
	throughput: 2000,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		OrderId,
		details,
		OrderDate,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		Address,
		City,
		State,
		PostalCode,
		Country,
		Phone,
		SMSOptIn,
		SMSStatus,
		Email,
		ReceiptUrl,
		Total,
		PaymentTransactionId,
		HasBeenShipped,
		orderdetailsstruct
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
